name: hacker-menu
description: Read Hacker News like a hacker

scripts.package: npm run build && electron-packager . 'Hacker Menu' --overwrite --sign='Developer ID Application: Jingwen Ou' --icon='images/Icon@1024.icns' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.31.0 --ignore='src' --ignore='node_modules/(babel|standard)' --ignore='node_modules/electron-(packager|prebuild|rebuild)'

author: Jingwen Owen Ou
